price: "E que: 'Pensamos que não escaparemos do castigo de Allah, na terra, e não escaparemos dEle, em fuga.'
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan nuʿ'jiza al-laha fī al-arḍi walan nuʿ'jizahu haraban
